description: Detects a suspicious call to the user32.dll function that locks the user workstation
false_positives: Scritps or links on the user desktop used to lock the workstation instead of Windows+L or the menu option
name: Suspicious Workstation Locking via Rundll32
query: (process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe AND process.parent.executable:*\\cmd.exe AND process.command_line:*user32.dll,* AND process.command_line:*LockWorkStation*)
author: frack113
